title: Yeni dunyam = My new world
creator_credit: Yusuf Hazar, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Migrating to Australia from Ankara, Turkey in 1978, Yusuf Hazar fondly looks back on the life he and his wife created for his six children. Feeling a deep sense of gratitude to his adopted country, Yusuf and his family are committed to helping out others in the community.
